Elves are scrawny little beggars who are able to get away
with wearing both
medium
and small armor. Humans, being a bit more bulky, are
restricted to medium
armor.






Clanretri@... on 05/05/99 08:29:07

Subject: [EverQuest] quest help / armor question




From: Clanretri@...

Hail all!

I have a question about the Paladin quest in Nfreeport.
It's the one
about
the tokens of courage and generosity, anyone know where i
can find those
tokens he did not give any hints whatsoever:(
Also the dwarven ringmail tunic, i understand that's it's
for small
races
only? but I seen a couple of high-elves wearing them, so is
it possible for
human to wear it as well?
Any help will be greatly appreciated, thanx!


Bobaliya
